context.apps.demos.helloroom
Class HelloRoomIntelligible

java.lang.Object
  context.apps.demos.helloroom.HelloRoom
      context.apps.demos.helloroom.HelloRoomIntelligible

public class HelloRoomIntelligible
extends HelloRoom

Intelligible version of the Hello Room tutorial application. It provides a GUI to allow the user to ask several types of questions, and displays generated explanations in a text area below.
